titleStmt.title: The famous chronicle of king Edward the first, sirnamed Edward Longshankes with his returne from the holy land. Also the life of Lleuellen rebell in Wales. Lastly, the sinking of Queene Elinor, who sunck at Charingcrosse, and rose againe at Pottershith, now named Queenehith.
King Edward the First
titleStmt.author: Peele, George, 1556-1596.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Abell Ieffes, and are to be solde by William Barley, at his shop in Gratious streete,

notesStmt.note: Signed at end: George Peele Maister of Artes in Oxenford.
Reproduction of a photostat of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
Quires F, H, and K in photostat.
